item.title: Computer Assisted Proofs
item.author: siddhartha.gadgil@gmail.com (Siddhartha Gadgil)
item.description: A rapidly growing area is Computer Assisted Proofs of claims that are expressed in precise mathematical terms. These can include ordinary mathematical theorems,as well as claims that pieces of hardware or software, network protocols, and mechanical and hybrid systems meet their specifications.
